block.gtceu.lv_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.mv_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.hv_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.ev_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.iv_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.luv_mystical_greenhouse.tool: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.zpm_mystical_greenhouse.tool: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.uv_mystical_greenhouse.toolt: §7Sieving is boring. How about some agriculture?
block.gtceu.dimensional_finder.tooltip.1: §7This machine can send pulses into deep space, recording the echoes on crystals, and can sometimes triangulate a region's location based on that data.
block.gtceu.folding_akreyrium_stabiliser: §7A reintegration device designed to recombine Akreyrium. By folding the distinct variants of Akreyrium through a precise stabilization matrix over a crystal, a highly refined and pure version of Akreyrium can be obtained.
§7The folding stabiliser utilises a lens to focus the reintegration, The proper type should be chosen based on the Akreyrium variant, reinsertion is necessary after every use.
block.gtceu.gate_assembly.tooltip.0: §7A forge powerful enough to fuse together the parts of a stargate into one.
§7A machine that can fold together rods using large amounts of rotational force, condensing layers on top of layers to create some incredibly resilient materials.
block.gtceu.large_quantum_compressor.too: §7This multi can compress large amounts of matter into infusions and collapse gravi-stars into a singularities via said infusions.
block.gtceu.runic_circuitry_assembling_s: §7An apparatus crossing the boundaries between technology and magic, that can inscribe dense plates with pure singularities to write runes containing mystical powers.
block.gtceu.runic_inscribe_manipulate.to: §7A more advanced Runic Inscriber, that can layer runes on top of each other to fuse their powers, or assemble them into a structured block form so they can exert power over the material world.
§7A giant structure designed with the ability to create extremely strong blocks inscribed with ancient runes that hold the power to slip between the cracks in space.
block.gtceu.chemical_plant.tooltip.0: §7This machine can compress chemical lines into one recipe and is able to perform more advanced chemical reactions.
block.gtceu.chemical_plant.tooltip.1: Has §6Perfect Overclock§r and can use §3Parallel§r hatches§7.
block.gtceu.component_part_assembly.tool: §7An assembler that can micro craft some incredibly complex components that are too detailed for a normal assembler.
block.gtceu.exotic_gas_siphon.tooltip.1: §7Utilising precision filtration and molecular isolation technologies, it efficiently separates exotic compounds from ambient environments, ensuring high-purity yields for any applications.
block.gtceu.exotic_gas_siphon.tooltip.4: §7Siphons exotic gasses directly from the atmosphere through a complex filtration and refining process, directly condensing traditional collection and distillation methods.
block.gtceu.exotic_gas_siphon.tooltip.7: §7This machine can collect the ambient air in the surrounding atmosphere, providing the same functionality as a basic §fGas Collector§7.
block.gtceu.heat_chamber.tooltip.0: §7This large multiblock can reach extreme heats in a controlled environment, and can use that heat to purify materials and catalyse reactions.
block.gtceu.heat_chamber.tooltip.1: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
§7A machine that can provide incredible heat and pressure, making it capable of fusing together incomplete products into some of the most resilient materials known across the galaxy.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.nuclear_reactor.tooltip.0: §7A medium sized reactor that can use relatively simple nuclear reactions to make some extremely useful materials.
block.gtceu.primitive_ore_factory.toolti: §7Your first all in one ore processing machine.
block.gtceu.steam_ore_factory.tooltip.0: §7A slightly more advanced ore processor, that can accept inputs from buses and hatches, and because of that can be automated.
block.gtceu.electric_ore_factory.tooltip: §7The electric all in one ore processing machine.
block.gtceu.ore_processing_plant.tooltip: §7A new tier of ore processing machine that far exceeds the throughput capacity of the previous tier.
block.gtceu.bulk_ore_processing_array.to: §7The §4ULTIMATE§7 tier of ore processing machine that far exceeds the throughput capacity of all previous tiers.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §cSubtick Parallels§r, §2Bulking§r, and §bThroughput Boosting
block.gtceu.industrial_barrel.tooltip.0: §7A BIG barrel that can do most of the things that both the Large Barrels can.
block.gtceu.large_barrel.tooltip.0: §7A larger and better barrel, that can process larger amounts of items faster than the small one, along with having some new recipes.
block.gtceu.large_farm.tooltip.0: §7An automated farm that runs during the day, providing you with some early sources of crops.
block.gtceu.large_stone_barrel.tooltip.0: §7A larger stone barrel that can make all kinds of stones and lava.
block.gtceu.rock_filtrator.tooltip.0: §7A multiblock that can sieve through gravel and sand more precisely than a basic sieve could ever achieve, uncovering the gems hidden inside.
block.gtceu.rock_filtrator.tooltip.2: §7You are gonna need multiple Output Buses
block.gtceu.rock_sifter.tooltip.0: §7A more powerful version of the Rock Filtrator, that can sieve materials at an astonishing speed.
block.gtceu.cobbleworks.tooltip.0: §7A large cube that can generate and process cobblestone into its most useful crushed forms, ready for sieving.
block.gtceu.large_sieve.tooltip.0: §7The evolved version of the Mechanical Sieve, fully applying the technologies at your disposal to create a machine that can sieve much faster and in larger quantities.
block.gtceu.mechanical_sieve.tooltip.0: §7A somewhat primitive machine that can sieve automatically for you, relying only on some power to pump out massive amounts of resources without any effort.
block.gtceu.void_excavator.tooltip.0: §7A more powerful Void Extractor that can harvest the resources from the abyss with unparalleled speed.
block.gtceu.void_extractor.tooltip.0: §7A machine that uses the ever present abyss under your feet to extract resources. Where they come from is unknown, but there is no time for those questions.
block.gtceu.void_extractor.tooltip.2: §7You are gonna need multiple Output Buses and Hatches
block.gtceu.essence_enchancer.tooltip.0: §7A convoluted machine, that can infuse mystical essences with large amounts of electricity to trigger a change in their composition, making them more useful.
block.gtceu.essence_replicator.tooltip.0: §7A machine that can duplicate essences indefinitely, although for the more advanced ones, it requires special fluids to function properly.
block.gtceu.dimensional_destabiliser.too: §7A mysterious structure that can stimulate cracks in space to harvest heavy elements from it that have never been observed before.
block.gtceu.greenhouse.tooltip.0: §7An electrical machine that stimulates the growth of plants, flowers and saplings, allowing you to more easily farm them.
block.gtceu.latex_plantation.tooltip.0: §7A multiblock that is way faster then the arboreal extractor for gathering latex
§7A powerful machine that can splice complex molten chemicals into smaller chunks for processing
block.gtceu.vibration_laser_engraver.too: §7A multiblock that uses precise lasers and vibrations to effortlessly reform and engrave gems, chips, and crystals, changing them in whatever way you need.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §cSubtick Parallels§r, §2Bulking§r, and §bThroughput Boosting
block.gtceu.cyclonic_sifter.tooltip.0: §7An advanced tier of sifter that is more precise and stronger than the basic tier, allowing it to run better recipes.
block.gtceu.injection_mixer.tooltip.0: §7An advanced tier of mixer that can create more precise mixtures than the basic tier, allowing it to run better recipes.
§7An advanced tier of centrifuge that is more powerful than the basic tier, allowing it to run better recipes.
block.gtceu.classic_stargate_display.too: §7This is not a mandatory multiblock, but just exists to assist you with building the §3Classic Stargate
block.gtceu.t_large_bender.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the bender that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_centrifuge.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the centrifuge that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_electrolyzer.tooltip: §7A larger variant of the electrolyzer that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_extruder.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the extruder that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_forming_press.toolti: §7A larger variant of the forming press that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_lathe.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the lathe that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_macerator.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the macerator that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_mixer.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the mixer that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_ore_washer.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the ore washer that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_sifter.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the sifter that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_thermal_centrifuge.t: §7A larger variant of the thermal centrifuge that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_wiremill.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the wiremill that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.t_large_autoclave.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the autoclave that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
block.gtceu.large_rock_crusher.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the rock crusher that can process materials with more energy efficiency.
gtceu.nuclear_turbine.tooltip: DEPRECATED. Will be removed next update!
gtceu.machine.energy_converter.tooltip_t: Starts as §fEU Converter§7, use Soft Mallet to change
material.gtceu.astatine_bis_tritelluride: Astatine Bis-Tritelluride Cobo-Selenium Over Iron Titanium Oxide
material.gtceu.hafnium_thorium_iron_2_hy: Hafnium Thorium Iron II Hydroxide Potassium Disilicate
material.gtceu.hafnium_thorium_iron_magn: Hafnium Thorium Iron Magnesium Disilicate Monosulfate
Hafnium Thorium Iron Magnesium Disilicate Monosulfate Bonded Iron II Barium Diastatide Trisulfate
material.gtceu.seaborgium_cerium_tricarb: Seaborgium Cerium Tricarbon Tetrakis-Orthosilicate Linked Dipolonium Diplatinum Tris-Pyrophosphate
material.gtceu.flerovium_hexaoxide_octaf: Flerovium Hexaoxide Octafluorosulfatoplutonate Enriched Rare Earth
block.gtceu.draco_circuit_assembler.tool: §7A circuit fabrication nexus weaving more advanced processors. It assembles high-tier circuits while mass-assembling lesser circuits with extreme precision.
Has §cSubtick Parallels§r and §9Assembly Line Logic§r. Can use §3Parallel§r hatches
block.gtceu.cryostate_quantum_chiller.to: §7A precision quantum cooling array capable of handling absolute-zero cryogenic coolants for advanced matter state manipulation and bulk vacuum freezing.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §cSubtick Parallels§r, §2Bulking§r, and §bThroughput Boosting
block.gtceu.ancient_refinement_center.to: §7Ancient Technology utilized to combine all the needed resource generators.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §cSubtick Parallels§r, and §2Bulking
block.gtceu.draco_infusion.tooltip.1: §7A mystic convergence of abyssal energies, channeling primal draconic forces to awaken and enhance matter at a fundamental level. It transforms the ordinary into the extraordinary through ritualistic infusion with a catalyst.
block.gtceu.draco_infusion.tooltip.4: §7The items must be correctly placed as shown in the recipe in the input buses of the Draconic Infusion Array from the perspective of the player facing the controller.
block.gtceu.mega_abs.tooltip.1: §7A nether-forged blazing chamber channeling concentrated hellfire to rapidly smelt and alloy materials. Its searing heat accelerates alloying far beyond traditional flame.
block.gtceu.mega_abs.tooltip.4: §7For every §f900K§7 above the recipe temperature, a multiplicative §f95%%§7 energy multiplier is applied pre-overclocking.
block.gtceu.mega_abs.tooltip.5: §7For every §f1800K§7 above the recipe temperature, one overclock becomes §f100%% efficient§7 (perfect overclock).
block.gtceu.mega_abs.tooltip.6: §7For every voltage tier above §bMV§7, temperature is increased by §f100K§7.
block.gtceu.mega_abs.tooltip.8: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.supreme_plasma_turbine.toolt: §7A massive turbine capable of being boosted consuming extreme quantities of fuel for extreme quantities of power.
§7Each Rotor Holder above §9IV§7 multiplies efficiency by 10% and multiplies EU/t by 2.
§c§uTurbine Parallels: §7Turbine can run up to §a6x§7 as many recipes as a standard Large Plasma Turbine.
§6Lubricant Boosting: §7Consumes 1000B of §fTungsten Disulfide§7 an Hour for an additional §a+25% §fEU/t §7output, failure to do so leads to a loss of §4-10% §fEU/t §7output.
§3Coolant Boosting: §7Consumes 2500B of §fSuperstate Helium 3§7 an Hour for an additional §a+75% §fEU/t §7output.
§7Note: §oCoolant Boosting§r§7 only occurs if §oLubricant Boosting§r§7 is Active.
block.gtceu.nyinsane_plasma_turbine.tool: §7A massive turbine capable of being boosted consuming extreme quantities of fuel for extreme quantities of power.
§7Each Rotor Holder above §9IV§7 multiplies efficiency by 10% and multiplies EU/t by 2.
§c§uTurbine Parallels: §7Turbine can run up to §a12x§7 as many recipes as a standard Large Plasma Turbine.
§6Lubricant Boosting: §7Consumes 2500B of §fTungsten Disulfide§7 an Hour for an additional §a+50% §fEU/t §7output, failure to do so leads to a loss of §4-20% §fEU/t §7output.
§3Coolant Boosting: §7Consumes 800B of §fOganesson Stabilized Bose-Einstein Condensate§7 an Hour for an additional §a+150% §fEU/t §7output.
§7Note: §oCoolant Boosting§r§7 only occurs if §oLubricant Boosting§r§7 is Active.
block.gtceu.super_compact_heat_chamber.t: §7A compacted and upgraded heat chamber capable of purifying materials and catalysing reactions at an enhanced rate through its ultra-dense thermal reactor design.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches, has §bThroughput Boosting§r, and §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.kiln.tooltip.0: §7A stronger, beefier version of the campfire for your manufacturing needs.
block.gtceu.steam_kiln.tooltip.0: §7A Kiln with buses and steam parallels.
block.gtceu.bessemer_forgery.tooltip.0: §7An Electric Powered Beast for Manufacturing Steel
block.gtceu.circuit_manufacturing_facili: §7A Machine Designed to Ensure Quality Circuits
block.gtceu.high_pressure_steam_hammer.t: §7A larger variant of the forge hammer capable of running multiple recipes at once.
block.gtceu.high_pressure_steam_sifter.t: §7Able to sort out the rarest of goods depending on mesh used.
block.gtceu.machine_facility.tooltip.0: §7It figured out how to assemble machines.
block.gtceu.electric_sifter.tooltip.0: §7An Electric Version of Sifting that requires the finest of sediments.
block.gtceu.steeled_blast_furnace.toolti: §7A Primitive Blast Furnace automatable from the controller.
block.gtceu.large_me_assembler.tooltip.0: A large version of the ME Assembler able to scale your needs even higher
block.gtceu.tree_synthesizer.tooltip.0: §7A larger greenhouse that provides ample space for gigantic trees to be grown, and felled.
block.gtceu.tree_synthesizer.tooltip.1: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.industrial_fishery.tooltip.0: §7A large scale industrial fishing complex that can quickly gather tons of your favorite marine lifeforms.
block.gtceu.industrial_fishery.tooltip.1: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.hydroponic_garden.tooltip.0: §7A water based growing pod that can grow massive quantities of crops in seconds.
block.gtceu.hydroponic_garden.tooltip.1: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.composting_factory.tooltip.0: §7A very quick composter that can provide you with enough bonemeal to last lifetimes.
block.gtceu.composting_factory.tooltip.1: Can use §3Parallel§r hatches and has §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.macerators.tooltip.1: §7Macerators only produce byproducts shown in JEI at HV or higher
block.gtceu.multithreaded_component_synt: §7The paragon of known component manufacturing capabilities able to absorb the technical capabilities of attached systems and maximize them to the greatest yield.
§7Components and Component parts are crafted in sets of 64 while their material cost is only 75% of what it would typically be.
block.gtceu.component_nexus.tooltip.1: §7Once stabilized this amalgamation of a machine is able to assemble components from §dLuV§7 to §3UV§7 without the need for ordered inputs.
block.gtceu.component_part_hub.tooltip.1: §7Once stabilized this amalgamation of a machine is able to assemble component parts without the need for ordered inputs.
block.gtceu.super_abs.tooltip.1: §7Funneling and heating has elevated this machine to another level of manufacturing capabilities.
block.gtceu.super_abs.tooltip.4: §7For every §f900K§7 above the recipe temperature, a multiplicative §f95%%§7 energy multiplier is applied pre-overclocking.
block.gtceu.super_abs.tooltip.5: §7For every §f1800K§7 above the recipe temperature, one overclock becomes §f100%% efficient§7 (perfect overclock).
block.gtceu.super_abs.tooltip.6: §7For every voltage tier above §bMV§7, temperature is increased by §f100K§7.
block.gtceu.super_ebf.tooltip.1: §7Funneling and heating has elevated this machine to another level of manufacturing capabilities.
block.gtceu.super_ebf.tooltip.4: §7For every §f900K§7 above the recipe temperature, a multiplicative §f95%%§7 energy multiplier is applied pre-overclocking.
block.gtceu.super_ebf.tooltip.5: §7For every §f1800K§7 above the recipe temperature, one overclock becomes §f100%% efficient§7 (perfect overclock).
block.gtceu.super_ebf.tooltip.6: §7For every voltage tier above §bMV§7, temperature is increased by §f100K§7.
block.gtceu.super_implosion_compressor.t: §7The chaining of explosions helps this machine process at immense rates.
§7Coils impact the machine the same they would a §fMulti Smelter§7.
block.gtceu.super_cutter.tooltip.0: §7A larger variant of the cutter that can process more materials at once.
block.gtceu.super_electric_ore_factory.t: §7An Electric Ore Factory pushed to its limits.
block.gtceu.atomic_synthesis_plant.toolt: §7Not only is this machine capable of performing the task of a §6Chemical Plant§7 but it also pushes beyond what the know synthesis of chemisty beholds.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches, has §6Perfect Overclock§r, §cSubtick Parallels§r, §2Bulking§r, and §bThroughput Boosting
§7It turns out the more pressure you add the stronger the fusing of materials becomes.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches, has §bThroughput Boosting§r, and §cSubtick Parallels
block.gtceu.aqueous_transformation_proce: §7A hyper-efficient liquid-phase refinement nexus that bends hydrological behavior to your will, accelerating dissolution and condensation pathways far beyond natural limits.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.ascendant_engraving_matrix.t: §7A transcendent inscription lattice capable of etching matter, energy, and data with impossible precision, stabilizing patterns that lesser machines cannot even perceive.
§7Available Recipe Types: §fLaser Engraver§7, §fRunic Circuitry Assembling Station§7, §fRunic Inscribtion and Manipulation
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.byteforce_unified_incomparab: §7A computational construction depot where instruction, assembly, and routing merge into a single ultra-cohesive fabrication stream, eliminating bottlenecks at every layer.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.electro_magnetic_material_ri: §7A violent yet impossibly controlled field-flux engine that tears molecular alignments apart and reconfigures them under overwhelming authority.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.fermenting_arboreal_rejuvina: §7A biomaterial megastructure that coerces flora, fauna, and microbial substrates into perpetual metabolic overdrive, yielding resources at an unnatural ecological cadence.
§7Available Recipe Types: §fHydroponic Garden§7, §fComposting Factory§7, §fIndustrial Fishery§7, §fTree Greenhouse
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.gravitational_compression_ch: §7A mass-bending compression crucible that weaponizes artificial gravity wells to deform, fold, and densify materials into ultra-stable configurations.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
§7A destructive-refinement array that vaporizes bulk matter into fundamental particulate clouds, then reforms them through extreme regimes.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.molecular_inducing_xanadu.to: §7A molecular harmonization sanctum where reactive mediums are coerced into perfect structural patterns through controlled agitation, saturation, and catalytic immersion.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.subatomic_particle_lattice_i: §7A particle-precision reduction terminal capable of shearing materials down to their sub-lattices, isolating filaments, at near-quantum tolerances.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.superior_particulate_isolati: §7An ultra-fine matter stratification nexus that separates particulate flows with near-perfect fidelity, preserving purity and entropy alignment across every output stream.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
block.gtceu.yielding_excression_advanced: §7A multiphase thermal-reactive refinery that fractionates complex fluids, vapors, and slurries into immaculate phases through relentless distillation and controlled fermentation cycles.
Can use §3Parallel§r hatches§r, has §5Threading§r, §2Bulking§r, and §cSubtick Parallels§r
